message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, I still believe we could reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to lower the price to $95?
